sentences.sContent: The church was lit up by floodlights.
sentences.sCn: 这座教堂被泛光灯照亮。

sentences.sContent: In the evening the facade is floodlit.
sentences.sCn: 晚上，建筑物的正面是用泛光灯照明的。

synos.tran: 照明灯；[电]泛光灯；探照灯

trans.tranOther: a very bright light that is used to light the outside of a building or sports ground at night
If a building or place is floodlit, it is lit by floodlights
